contents.text: Welcome to npm Inc in the East Bay, the world’s largest JavaScript package registry.
For help finding and using packages, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with a package discovery specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to find a lightweight HTTP client library and get guidance on integrating it into my project.
I need guidance locating and installing a logging library for my JavaScript app.
Help me find a JavaScript package that meets my peer-dependency constraints and install it via npm.
I’m having trouble finding and installing a date-formatting package in npm.
I need help installing and using a JavaScript library for visualizing physics simulations.

contents.text: For help publishing and managing your own package, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with a publishing support representative.

navigationGoals: Help me publish my new CLI tool to npm, including setting up versioning and access controls.
I’d like to publish and manage my own npm package that I developed to assist veterans.
Assist me in publishing my npm module, including setting up package.json, semantic versioning, and access control.
I need assistance publishing my new npm package; I’m not sure how to start.
I want to publish my differential equations solver library to npm and manage its versions.

contents.text: For enterprise solutions and partnership inquiries, press '2'.
For information on enterprise licensing and dedicated support, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with our enterprise solutions team.

navigationGoals: I’m exploring enterprise plans for private npm registries and dedicated support for my development team.
I want details on enterprise plans to support my veteran-led startup’s package management.
I need details on npm Enterprise licensing tiers, SLAs, and dedicated support for team deployments.
I’d like details on enterprise licensing for my company's npm use.
I’d like details on npm enterprise licensing and support for my university research group.

contents.text: For our non-profit and open source program inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with our non-profit partnerships coordinator.

navigationGoals: I want to inquire about npm’s open source program benefits for our non-profit and check eligibility requirements.
I need information on non-profit or open-source support for a veterans mentoring platform.
I’m exploring npm’s nonprofit/open-source sponsorship program—what are the eligibility criteria and benefits?
I represent a charity and want to join npm’s non-profit support program.
I’m looking into npm’s open source program for academic projects and how to qualify.
